title: The Death of a Queen and a Restaurant | Daily Best of September 14 | Rick & Bubba
description:
We look at the immediate aftermath of Queen Elizabeth II passing. From trashing her legacy to calling for reparations, the woke media just won't stop. In other news, thousands of cups from Rick & Bubba's short-lived restaurant are turning up 20 years later on the streets of New York City. In politics, Joe Biden and his administration act like they are winning the fight against inflation and securing the border. And lastly, Bubba gives us a health update as he prepares to undergo surgery next week.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
